description: The reusable Data Table component is a prerequisite for all major list views in the admin dashboard.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize ADM-005-T1 as the first task of Sprint 1. Define a clear component API early to allow parallel development on pages using mock data.
impact_if_delayed: A 1-day delay on the table component will delay three major stories.

description: The implementation of the geofencing map page depends on the technical findings and library choice from the research spike.
mitigation_plan: Time-box the spike strictly. If major blockers are found, escalate immediately to re-evaluate the feature's scope or timeline.
impact_if_delayed: Delay in spike completion will directly delay the entire geofencing feature delivery.

description: All frontend development tasks depend on the availability of stable, documented backend APIs.
mitigation_plan: Establish API contracts (OpenAPI specs) before sprints begin. Use mock servers (e.g., MSW) on the frontend to allow for parallel development.
impact_if_delayed: Any delay in API delivery will block frontend implementation and testing.
